'''The pizza guy''' is a man who delivers pizza to [[Monica's apartment]] in "[[The One With George Stephanopoulos|The One with George Stephanopoulos]]". He is portrayed by [[Sean Whalen]].

He delivers [[George Stephanopoulos]]'s pizza to Monica's apartment by mistake. Rachel tells him that they ordered a pizza with fat-free crust with extra cheese. He calls himself bonehead for making such a mistake.
